Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the profile information of a Query response payload.
        """
kwargs = {'profile_information': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The profile information must be a list of ProfileInformation structures.',
    payloads.QueryResponsePayload, **kwargs)
kwargs = {'profile_information': ['invalid']}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The profile information must be a list of ProfileInformation structures.',
    payloads.QueryResponsePayload, **kwargs)
args = payloads.QueryResponsePayload(), 'profile_information', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The profile information must be a list of ProfileInformation structures.',
    setattr, *args)
args = payloads.QueryResponsePayload(), 'profile_information', ['invalid']
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'The profile information must be a list of ProfileInformation structures.',
    setattr, *args)
